Help! Welcome to Hands Up - tagline! What hands up does Feedback options available are: Skip Next Back Done Select to show understanding of the topic Select to show you need the topic to be repeated Select to show you need some extra help on the topic These icons can be used to indicate understanding on a topic. Letters can be used to respond to multiple choice questions.
